name: Merge Fairy Tales - Merge Game
description:
Fairy Tale Kingdom

Welcome to Fairy Tale Kingdom, where you can meet famous fairy tales and legends characters. You can collect gems, precious coins and mysterious treasure chests. Hundreds of items are waiting for you to discover with drag and drop, merge and eliminate. Through powerful merge combinations , To create new upgrade items, the more times you merge, the larger your land.
Come on and make your fairy tale kingdom come alive!

Game features:
* Mergers are easy and fun, but they also involve many strategies!
* Every merger and challenge mission will bring magical rewards, and finally awaken a new fairy tale character.
* Fun and exciting levels with unlimited exploration and gameplay.
* Earn gems, gold coins, and wood to buy more items in the shop.
* Clear the fog to unlock and reveal the secrets in the new area. The vast land is full of new discoveries!
What will your dream merger strategy look like? Looking forward to your challenge!
